contest-event.event-date:
July 21, 1928 D Oxfordshire & District Contest (Section 2)
Oxfordshire & District Contest (Section 2) 20 Test Piece Contest Oxfordshire & District Contest oxfordshire-district-contest-section-2
None
L'Ebreo [arr. Godfrey]
Shipton Manor, Shipton-on-Cherwell, Oxfordshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £12.12s. and shield, 2nd £6.6s. 2 bands competed.
Jim Alder's COSB history lists the piece as 'Semiramide', but 'L'Ebreo' is from an original programme.
No Section 1 this year (cancelled due to low entry). Prizes were cascaded down a section, so the usual Section 1 prizes were given to Section 2 bands.
March 29, 2013, 9:38 a.m. March 1, 2021, 12:23 p.m.
1 City of Oxford Silver Band Frank Brooks
2 Brackley Borough A. Smith
